title: The Tech Selloff Is Ugly. But the 2000 and 2008 Crashes Were Far Worse. - Barron's
content: The Tech Selloff Is Ugly. But the 2000 and 2008 Crashes Were Far Worse.  Barron's
description: The Nasdaq Composite is firmly in bear territory, but it has a long way to go to match tech meltdowns of the past.
